about.title: Perfect solution for advertising
about.text: Adleria is a new web solution for advertising on indoors and outdoors screens, the so called digital signage screens. Adleria aggregates, classifies and rates all the screens on an area and allows you to create campaigns on them. It is easy to find the relevant screens for your target groups. You can also filter by rating, only displaying ads on those screens that meets the standards that your publicity requires.
